about.title: About me
about.p1: I studied violin and spent years focused on music. I've always enjoyed creating and learning, and over time I found programming to be the perfect environment for both personal and professional growth.
about.p2: Since 2021 I've been learning, building projects, and working as a developer. I keep learning every day and enjoying the process.
about.p3: Want to get in touch? Write me at
